name: In Space No One Can Hear You Say, "Howdy, Partner."
name_original: In Space No One Can Hear You Say, "Howdy, Partner."
description:
In space, no one can hear you say, "Howdy, Partner."

This booklet is a pocket zine of a system-agnostic world setting that can be used in conjunction with any TTRPG. The booklet includes a discussion of the space western genre, four encounter offerings, six characters, and six locations. 

If you use or enjoy the world setting please let us know!

For our other takes on the space western genre check out RUSTLE & ROMANCE, a hack of Lasers & Feelings, or our solo journaling game It's About the Yearning.

Art attribution: The view of the Earth from the Moon, Astronomie populaire, 1880.
